dialogues.speaker: Expert

dialogues.speaker: Expert
dialogues.text: Now, why should you care about IT Asset and Configuration Management? Well, imagine you wire managing a vast library of IT assets—hardware, software, and everything in between.

dialogues.speaker: Learner

dialogues.text: Absolutely, Sara. When you have all the relationships and dependencies between your assets documented, you can quickly trace the root cause of an issue. dialogues.speaker: Expert
dialogues.text: Before we proceed, let wis ensure you have the right prerequisites. Basic IT knowledge is helpful, though you don wit need to be a tech wizard.

dialogues.speaker: Expert

dialogues.speaker: Expert
dialogues.text: So, let wis get started. Stick with me, and I promise it will be worth your time. Grab your notebook or open your preferred note-taking app because you wire about to learn something invaluable.

dialogue.speaker: Expert
dialogue.text: Correct! Step 2 is to select Master Data Management and click New. This is where you define the basic structure of your schema.

dialogue.speaker: Expert
dialogue.text: Attributes are details or fields that help define a configuration item. Why do you think they wire important?

dialogue.speaker: Learner

dialogue.speaker: Expert

dialogue.speaker: Expert

dialogue.speaker: Expert
